author: USA TODAY, Cydney Henderson, USA TODAY
title: Lululemon apologizes after art director advertises 'Bat Fried Rice' shirt; fires employee
description: Lululemon has cut ties with its art director, who promoted an racist design. The company said the controversial shirt "is not a lululemon product."
content:
Drama has returned to Lululemon.
Lululemon is apologizing after its art director shared a "bat fried rice" t-shirt design on social media that has been slammed online as "racist" and "anti-Asian" amid the coronavirus pandemic. 
On Sunday, Trevor Fleming, th… [+2700 chars]
